analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/10/0x9b5dbf69b096a12153def9b8d19c1076a3f40291.sol:
	Contract IMCToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/10/0x9b5dbf69b096a12153def9b8d19c1076a3f40291.sol#361-364)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

IMCIssuingRecord.sendTokenToPlatform (/unique_chucks/10/0x9b5dbf69b096a12153def9b8d19c1076a3f40291.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-imcToken.issue(platformAddr,_tokens) (/unique_chucks/10/0x9b5dbf69b096a12153def9b8d19c1076a3f40291.sol)
